Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Nobody \No"bod*y\, n.; pl. {Nobodies}. [No, a. + body.] 1. No person; no one; not anybody. [1913 Webster]
2. Hence: A person of no influence or importance; an insignificant or contemptible person. [Colloq.] [1913 Webster]
nobody n : a person of no influence [syn: {cipher}, {cypher}, {nonentity}]
